text: The women's singles was a tennis event held as part of the Tennis at the 1920 Summer Olympics programme. It was the fourth appearance of the event. A total of 18 players from 7 nations competed in the event, which was held from 16 to 24 August 1920 at the Beerschot Tennis Club. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== ==Sources== * * * ITF, 2008 Olympic Tennis Event Media Guide Women's singles Category:1920 in women's tennis Ten
title: Tennis at the 1920 Summer Olympics – Women's singles
